Header: Election Commission prepared for any poll
Content: Chairman of the Elections Commission Mahinda Deshapriya says that the Election Commission is prepared to hold any election. He said this while attending a function to mark the Voters Day which falls today.Anyone above the age of 18 is eligible to register as a voter. A ceremony to mark to Voters Day was held at Moratuwa Yuana area with the participation of Elections Commission Chairman Mahinda Deshapriya. Speaking on the occasion he said that they hope to prepare a list of those who are between the ages of 15 and 18 years.
